title: BEWARE!! 🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️
text:
Never ever use this app. The company is super shady. I bought an item that was marked “new” but clearly the seller had lied. The item was damaged and not at all “new”. When I asked for a refund, it’s Vinted’s policy to have the BUYER PAY FOR RETURNS EVEN WHEN THEY ARE THE VICTIM OF FALSE ADVERTISING.  This means that if I were to return it I would literally lose money since the return will cost me more than the value of the item. Their customer service was AWFUL. 

Their “buyer protection” does nothing to protect the buyer. It’s just shipping insurance. 🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️

This platform is not to be trusted as they are supporting lying and protecting the perpetrators over the victims.

DO NOT TRUST VINTED!!

title: Read seller reviews!
text: Ever since there was a time I was scammed and didn’t receive the product or my money back, I’ve always been prepared for something like that to happen again. Suppose that’s what happens on apps like this. Which is why I started to pay even more attention to the seller reviews and how many stars they have. I recommend doing the same thing since it help lessen the likelihood of getting scammed.

title: Shipping Is Ridiculous
text: I have had this app for a few years now. Initially, I absolutely LOVED it and bought most of my kids clothes and my clothes on here. Recently I have found that even if I find a good price on the clothes, the shipping is at least $8 on everything. This is mostly a platform to sell already used items. I refuse to spend just about the same amount for it used, as I would be buying it brand new. Especially when most of the cost is due to shipping. It’s been awhile since I’ve even purchased anything on here and may soon delete the app entirely.

title: Shipping fees are so high compared to other apps
text:
Yes Vinted don’t have seller fees… granted! But they also don’t have customer service , they do not have accurate tracking for shipping, they don’t have shipping contracted rates ( meaning that you pay up to $16 for shipping + buyer fees and taxes so about $20) …
To put in perspective: if an item cost $1 but it’s over 2lb then yeah $1+$20…. And you know what they also don’t have ? Seller PROTECTION! Don’t matter if usps was tracking and delivered, if the buyer claims was not there goes your item and your money… 
Meh!

title: Disgusting
text: I literally cannot convey enough how horrible this app is and how you absolutely will be robbed of your money one way or another — if you’re a seller, you’ll be screwed over somehow on your sales. Send an item and not get paid, AND not get the item back, etc. If you’re a buyer, good luck if an item never shows up — they’ll be sure to keep your money though. And if a seller scams you and then threatens you like what happened to me? Haha you guessed it, they’ll side with the scammer.

title: Not sure what to say
text: On old vinted i sold a lot of stuff. If i relied on vinted for income over the last year, i would have starved to death.  Service fees and postage are killing this once unique platform. I dont pretend to know what the answer is. One suggestion is that item that arent sold within a month or two fall off. The seller can relist. I see the same things on this site month after month.

title: Not good like it used to be
text: I used to use this app and sold things everyday!  Ever since they switched to no sellers fees, it switched to no sales at all!! The only way you Al can attempt to make money is to PAY to bump your sales.  Also, literally every time you tap on this app, you can’t proceed until you update it and when I say that could be 1-2 times a week or more, not kidding! It’s completely ridiculous.  I went from making $500+ a month on this app to $0 in over 2 years!! Go to Mercari or Poshmark!! Or even Kidizen.  I wouldn’t waste your time here guys ✌🏻

title: Could be great!
text: I have used this app for a year now. You can keep pricing cheaper but the shipping is OUTRAGEOUS. I buy a lot on these type of apps. Like 3-4 weekly. Vinted doesn’t get my business as much as I would like it to. Sellers have no window for shipping. I ordered and after 2 weeks of not being shipped and getting the run around by the help team I still didn’t get refunded. Luckily the seller shipped it eventually. Help team said after 5 BUSINESS days I would be refunded and the item canceled. Wrote back in after 10 business days with no refund to be told I had to still wait. Again this app could be great. Create terms for sellers to ship by a certain amount of days (3 would be amazing) and figure out something in shipping because at no point in time should a tshirt or smaller cost $3 to buy but $15 to ship.
I love them, thank you!
